short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a branch name based on the current JIRA issue view.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension generates a branch name from a JIRA issue view and copies it to clipboard to be used as a name for your version control branches.
